header.tagline: Senior Estimator & Quantity Surveyor – Infrastructure & Commercial Projects

summary: Senior Estimator with 15+ years in construction estimating, impacting large-scale projects globally. Expert in infrastructure and commercial sectors with proven cost-saving implementations, achieving a 20% reduction in project expenses.

bullets.text: Led comprehensive analysis of tender documents, significantly improving project bid accuracy by 30% across 50 projects.
Executed precise first principle estimating, enhancing cost forecasting precision by 25% for civil projects, saving $500K annually.
Orchestrated preparation of Bills of Quantities, reducing project cost overruns by 20% through meticulous detail, impacting $2M in project costs.
Managed commercial offers and negotiated supplier quotes, achieving average savings of 15% on project costs, totaling $1.5M.
Evaluated additional costs due to design variations, reducing unnecessary expenditure by 18% via strategic assessments.
Prepared and finalized detailed BOQs and accounts, resulting in a 12% reduction in reconciliation timelines.
Oversaw documentation for project approvals, improving approval success rate to 95% through stringent quality checks.
Conducted comprehensive tender analysis, contributing to a 35% increase in bid success rate across high-profile projects.
Developed preliminary budgets and BOQs under pressure, successfully managing tight deadlines for critical infrastructure projects.
Coordinated submissions for TOC, increasing bid efficiency by 28% through detailed cost forecasting.
Strategically performed quantity take-offs, streamlining procurement strategies and ensuring a 20% reduction in waste.
Led post-design cost analyses and implemented budget adjustments, reducing project overruns by an average of 15%.
Reviewed and optimized construction methodologies, achieving compliance and budget adherence in 90% of cases.
Implemented innovative estimating techniques, securing projects up to $12.66M AUD with competitive advantage.
Analyzed tender documents meticulously, leading to a 40% decrease in contractual disputes over two years.
Executed comprehensive quantity take-off operations, optimizing material usage and reducing potential cost wastage by 15%.
Engaged in strategic supplier and subcontractor negotiations, cutting initial costs by 10% through precise cost consulting.
Drafted detailed construction proposals, improving project estimates accuracy and client satisfaction by over 25%.
Played a central role in dispute resolutions, effectively protecting $2M in client assets by applying detailed cost analysis.
Secured significant project wins, including the TRYP Wyndham Hotel ($60M), by delivering precise cost estimates.
Executed detailed quantity take-offs for high-rise projects, ensuring seamless alignment with design and financial projections.
Orchestrated BOQ preparations leading to efficiency enhancements and 10% cost savings on major projects.
Facilitated feasibility studies for land acquisitions, enhancing investment strategies with 30% growth in asset value recognition.
Prepared feasibility cost studies for large-scale development projects, aiding strategic decision making with a 40% success rate.
Managed architectural and engineering project measurements, increasing construction schedule reliability by 15%.
Performed comprehensive quantity take-offs and cost estimates on major healthcare projects, saving the company 18% in projected costs.
Developed and maintained cost management systems, improving budget accuracy by 20% on multiple projects.
Actively resolved construction disputes, safeguarding $1.5M in investments through strategic negotiations and cost reviews.
